  • Method Details

    • getExportImportController

      BizRulesExportImportController getExportImportController()
      Returns rule export/import controller.

    • isDeploymentEnabled

      boolean isDeploymentEnabled()
      Check if rule deployment capability is available on this system
      Returns:
      True if deployment is enabled, false otherwise.

    • isVersionDeployed

      boolean isVersionDeployed(RuleVersion version)
      Check if version is deployed on this system
      Parameters:
      version - a rule version
      Returns:
      True if deployed, false otherwise.

    • getDeploymentId

      Optional<String> getDeploymentId()
      Returns the deployment id of the current system.
      Returns:
      Returns the deployment id or Optional.empty() if the deployment is not enabled on the current system.

    • createHeadVersionsQuery

      Query<RuleVersion> createHeadVersionsQuery()
      Returns a query to get all latest rule versions.

    • getExistingHistory

      List<RuleVersion> getExistingHistory(RuleHead ruleHead)
      Returns a history for the given existing rule (RuleHead.HeadVersion)

    • getImportingHistory

      List<RuleVersion> getImportingHistory(RuleHead ruleHead)
      Returns a history for the given importing rule (RuleHead.InProgressImportTaskEntry.ImportedVersion)

    • getRuleHead

      RuleHead getRuleHead(RuleVersion version)
      Returns a rule head for the given version.

    • createNewRule

      @Deprecated RuleHead createNewRule(Bundle bundle)
      Deprecated.
      10.0.0 Use createRule(Bundle, EntityTypeReference<R>) instead
      Creates a new empty rule of the default Rule subtype.
      Parameters:
      bundle - a bundle in which to add the created rule head, initial version, and rule definition
      Returns:
      the created rule head

    • createNewRule

      <R extends Rule> RuleHead createNewRule(Bundle bundle, EntityTypeReference<R> ruleTypeReference)
      Creates a new empty rule of the specified subtype.
      Type Parameters:
      R - the Rule subtype for the new rule
      Parameters:
      bundle - a bundle in which to add the created rule head, initial version, and rule definition
      ruleTypeReference - a reference to the Rule subtype of the rule to be created
      Returns:
      the created rule head

    • cloneRule

      RuleHead cloneRule(Bundle bundle, Rule rule)
      Creates a new rule based on the given rule.
      Parameters:
      bundle - a bundle to add the created rule head
      rule - a rule to clone
      Returns:
      the created rule head

    • createNewDraft

      RuleVersion createNewDraft(RuleHead head, Rule basedOn)
      Creates a new draft version.
      Parameters:
      head - the rule head
      basedOn - a rule to copy
      Returns:
      the created version

    • createNewDraft

      RuleVersion createNewDraft(RuleHead head, RuleVersion basedOnVersion)
      Creates a new draft version.
      Parameters:
      head - the rule head
      basedOnVersion - a rule version to get rule and copy
      Returns:
      the created version

    • createNewDraft

      RuleVersion createNewDraft(RuleHead head, Rule basedOn, boolean cloneRule)
      Creates a new draft version.
      Parameters:
      head - the rule head
      basedOn - a rule to copy
      cloneRule - boolean defining if the rule should be cloned or not
      Returns:
      the created version

    • changeHeadVersionStatus

      RuleVersion changeHeadVersionStatus(RuleHead head, RuleStatus newStatus)
      Changes the latest version status.
      Parameters:
      head - a rule head
      newStatus - a new status
      Returns:
      the latest rule version

    • deleteDraft

      RuleVersion deleteDraft(RuleHead head)
      Deletes the given draft version or the entire rule if no other version exists.
      Parameters:
      head - a rule head
      Returns:
      the latest rule version or null if the rule is deleted.

    • resetHeadToLatestDeployedVersion

      RuleVersion resetHeadToLatestDeployedVersion(RuleHead head)
      Sets the Work In Progress version to the latest deployed version.
      Parameters:
      head - the rule head
      Returns:
      the latest rule version or null if the rule is deleted.

    • deploy

      void deploy(Bundle bundle, RuleVersion deployingVersion)
      Deploys the given version on the current system.
      Parameters:
      bundle - the entity bundle
      deployingVersion - the deploying version.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - when the deployment is not enabled on the system.
      IllegalArgumentException - when the deploying version is not approved.
      com.guidewire.pl.web.controller.UserDisplayableException - with an appropriate message if any of the following are true: the deploying version has been deleted, already deployed, has a newer approved version available, is not valid, or validation is pending.
      com.guidewire.pl.system.exception.InsufficientPermissionException - if the user does not have deployment permission

    • getRuleLinkInfo

      ILinkPropertyInfo getRuleLinkInfo()
      Returns a foreign key link on Rule declared on a concrete RuleVersion implementation.
      Returns:
      RuleVersion.Rule link

    • getLabelForExistingVersion

      String getLabelForExistingVersion(RuleVersion version, boolean evaluatedFlagVisible)
      Returns the label for the existing version.
      Parameters:
      version - The rule version
      evaluatedFlagVisible - Whether need to add "evaluated" suffix or not if the deployment is enabled on the current system and the given version is currently deployed (evaluated)
      Returns:
      the label

    • getLabelForImportingVersion

      String getLabelForImportingVersion(RuleVersion version)
      Returns the label for the importing version.
      Parameters:
      version - The importing version
      Returns:
      the label

    • getLabelForImportEntry

      String getLabelForImportEntry(RuleImportTaskEntry importEntry)
      Returns the label for the importing version by RuleImportTaskEntry.
      Parameters:
      importEntry - The import entry
      Returns:
      the label

    • getVersionNumberLabel

      String getVersionNumberLabel(RuleVersion version)
      Returns the version number label for the existing version
      Parameters:
      version - The rule version
      Returns:
      the label
